trans-unit.source: Iterates over the matching parent node according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref>, parent axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Iterar o nó principal correspondente acordo com o <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"> </xref>, principal regras do eixo.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: O estado do navegador alterações apenas se o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>método devolveu `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing the nodes.
trans-unit.target: O nó a partir do qual iniciar que atravessa os nós.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"> </xref> classe, que lhe permite filtrar nós com base no nome.
Devolve o navegador de resultado atual.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: O estado do navegador alterações apenas se o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>método devolveu `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next matching parent node.
trans-unit.target: Positions o iterator no nó principal correspondência seguinte.

trans-unit.source: If the next matching parent node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se existir o próximo nó principal correspondente, o método MoveNext define o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>propriedade para o navegador do resultado atual; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>propriedade permanece inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ParentIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next matching parent node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se existir o próximo nó principal correspondente. caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
